name: GraphQL
title: This quick reference cheat sheet provides a brief overview of GraphQL.

cards.title: Intro
cards.body: This quick reference cheat sheet provides a brief overview of GraphQL.

cards.title: Overview
cards.body:
• An alternative approach to RESTful APIs
• GraphQL is a query language for APIs
• Easily describe the shape of the GraphQL API using clear shared terms.
• Clients issue queries/mutations to read and update data
• GraphQL syntax can express complex entity relations
• Libraries to implement GraphQL in [different languages](https://graphql.org/code/)

[GraphQL](https://graphql.org/) {.link-arrow}

cards.title: Schema
cards.body:
|                |                                  |
| -------------- | -------------------------------- |
| `schema`       | GraphQL schema definition        |
| `query`        | Read and traverse data           |
| `mutation`     | Modify data or trigger an action |
| `subscription` | Run a query when an event occurs |

cards.title: Built-in Scalar Types
cards.body:
|           |                                              |
| --------- | -------------------------------------------- |
| `Int`     | Signed 32‐bit integer                        |
| `Float`   | Signed double-precision floating-point value |
| `String`  | UTF‐8 character sequence                     |
| `Boolean` | true or false                                |
| `ID`      | A Unique identifier                          |

cards.title: Type Definitions
cards.body:
|             |                   |
| ----------- | ----------------- |
| `scalar`    | Scalar Type       |
| `type`      | Object Type       |
| `interface` | Interface Type    |
| `union`     | Union Type        |
| `enum`      | Enum Type         |
| `input`     | Input Object Type |

cards.title: Type Modifiers
cards.body:
|              |                                   |
| ------------ | --------------------------------- |
| `String`     | Nullable String                   |
| `String!`    | Non-null String                   |
| `[String]`   | List of nullable Strings          |
| `[String]!`  | Non-null list of nullable Strings |
| `[String!]!` | Non-null list of non-null Strings |

cards.title: Input with multiple arguments
Custom Scalars
cards.body:
```js
scalar Url
type User {
    name: String
    homepage: Url
}
```
